scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags
scripts.publish:patch: npm run prepublishOnly && npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin main --tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm run prepublishOnly && npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin main --tags
scripts.publish:major: npm run prepublishOnly && npm version major && npm publish && git push origin main --tags
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prepublishOnly && npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta && git push origin main --tags
